html: (Mosiah 12:22; 15:29; 3 Nephi 16:18; 20:32)."They shall see eye to eye." Some commentaries suggest this means to look into the eyes of a friend. However, another meaning could be that these watchmen speak with a unified voice (they lift up the voice together). Latter-day revelation declares: "And every decision made by [these presiding] quorums [of watchmen] must be by the unanimous voice of the same; that is, every member in each quorum must be agreed to its decisions." (D&C 107:27.)
